description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Salad + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kids,Pescatarian,Fish,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Tomato,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tuna Salad + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 95g can of tuna in spring water, drained, flaked

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to the packet instructions. Drain and refresh under cold water.
Place tomato in an airtight container. Add vinegar, oil and a pinch of sea salt and black pepper. Top with cucumber, lettuce and tuna.
Stir herbs through pasta, then spoon into container and secure with a lid.
